quest.name: Underneath the Sultantree
journal: Papashan is in dire need of your assistance.

The stationmaster explains that he and the Sultansworn are in fact searching for Lady Lilira, a young noblewoman who has run away from home. He asks you to search for Lilira in the area to the south, near the Sultantree.
At the Sultantree, you find the young runaway, along with a sarcastic fellow who seems to know her well. Moments later, voidsent attack, forcing you to work together to protect Lady Lilira.

No sooner have you bested the creatures than you are overcome by strange visions, the meaning of which eludes you. When you subsequently come to your senses, you are relieved to find that Lady Lilira is safe, and apparently eager to return to the city. Head back to the Ul'dah Dispatch Yard and report all that has occurred to Papashan.

Papashan explains that the young man was most likely Thancred, a scholar conducting research on aether-related subjects. The stationmaster then thanks you for protecting Lady Lilira and asks that you show that same kindness to the other people of Thanalan.
objectives: Search for Lilira near the Sultantree.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Forename, I have just this moment─ No! No, the time for concealment is past! The truth is, even before I had you deliver those pretzels, I was privy to some most unsettling news!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: ...Which is the real reason I sent you to meet those Sultansworn.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: A young noblewoman from a very prestigious family has run away from home, and I have been ordered to see to her safe return.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: The Sultansworn you met earlier are assisting with the search. Alas, it seems they have found no trace of her.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I apologize for not being frank with you from the start, but we must proceed with caution─should word of her disappearance spread, I fear others with less honorable motives may join the hunt.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: And should we allow her to come to any harm, not even a hundred beheadings would be punishment enough...

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: That cannot happen, Forename. It must not!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I need you to help me find her!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Praise the Twelve, I knew I could count on you!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I've instructed the others to expand the search, but Thanalan is vast and there are only so many of us.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: The young noblewoman's name is Lady Lilira. I want you to go south and look for her in the vicinity of the Sultantree. Good luck!

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: O Sultantree...

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: O Sultantree, hallowed spirit of my line, forgive my weakness. My failings have cost us dear...

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: Show yourself!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)As you command, O Lilira.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Forgive my selfish desire to assure your welfare.

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: I don't recall requesting an escort! Simply pretend we never met and continue on your way.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)We both know I can do no such thing. It isn't safe for you here alone.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)It isn't safe for anyone─not with this aetheric disturbance... It's as though the dead are watching us...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)And I'd prefer not to join them, if it's all the same to you.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Ah, you must be the one that Papashan mentioned. Congratulations on finding our elusive young charge.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)You'll have to forgive Her Impetuousness. What she lacks in discipline, she makes up for in stubbornness.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)How peculiar... I could swear we've met, but haven't the faintest recollection as to where or when.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Must be the damned heat playing tricks on me. I'd best retire before I start having visions.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)You should return with us. The stationmaster will be eager to thank Lady Lilira's protector in person.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Alas, the stationmaster will have to wait.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Dear Lilira, for my sake, please stay out of harm's way.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)As for you, dear friend─for Lilira's sake─please stay in harm's way!

dialogue.name: MOTHERCRYSTAL
dialogue.text: Hear... Feel... Think...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Ah, coming around now.

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: Would you mind telling me what that was?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)If I only knew. A denizen of the void, at any rate.

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: The voidsent? Here? But how?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)The question isn't “how,” but “who”─we're not dealing with bookless bandits.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Don't suppose the answer came to you in a dream?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)No sooner did you fell the beast than you fell asleep. Too much aether, no doubt.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Interesting... I hadn't considered the Crystal.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)But of course... This changes everything.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Hm? Oh, just thinking aloud. At any rate, we haven't a moment to spare. I must return and report this at once.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)I leave Lady Lilira in your capable hands!

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: How dare you pass me about like a swaddled babe!

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: I shall return and tell them myself!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)As you wish, Your Impetuousness.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)I suspect we shall meet again before long.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: (-???-)Until then, do try and stay awake!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Thank the gods you've returned! You had us all so worried!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: You do realize what would happen if a person of your noble stature were to be injured─or worse?

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Why, Her Grace the sultana would be beside herself with grief─and so would her subjects! I daresay they'd be weeping in the streets!

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: But I have already given you cause to weep, Papashan...you and the people of Ul'dah...

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: Please, Your─ You're not to say such things! We will find it, I swear to you!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: It is not my place to make demands, m-my lady, but I beg you, please stay out of harm's way.

dialogue.name: LILILA
dialogue.text: ...I apologize for causing you undue worry, Papashan. I shall refrain from traveling unescorted in future.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I cannot thank you enough, Forename!

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I understand you fought bravely to protect Lady Lilira from voidsent fiends.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: For your gallant service, you deserve all the riches in the royal vaults. Alas, a small token of my gratitude is the best I can offer.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: ...Hm? A sarcastic man with a strange contraption strapped to his shoulder?

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I see you met Thancred. He's a scholar who spends his days investigating oddities in the aether. Rather too fond of the sound of his own voice for my liking, but perfectly harmless.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: As for you, Forename─you're just the sort of adventurer we need around here.

dialogue.name: PAPASHAN
dialogue.text: I pray you show the same kindness to the people of Thanalan as you did to us today.

dialogue.name: SCENE00002
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“MANWIL005”?

dialogue.name: SCENE00002
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: SCENE00002
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are about to enter an instanced battle. Instanced battles only occur during certain quests and missions.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Take a moment to read the information displayed in the active help window before answering the call of duty.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the blangas!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Come, let's attend to our uninvited guest!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Lovely, it brought friends!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Leave the big one to me! You handle the rest!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Stay close if you want me to heal you!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text:
More of them!?
Really now, there are limits to our hospitality!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Just a little more...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Pull yourself together!
